org.apache.flex.swf.types

Class BlurFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.swf.types.BlurFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataType

    public class BlurFilter
extends Object
implements IDataType
    The blur filter is based on a sub-pixel precise median filter (also known as a box filter). The filter is applied on each of the RGBA color channels.

    When the number of passes is set to three, it closely approximates a Gaussian Blur filter. A higher number of passes is possible, but for performance reasons, is not recommended.
